title: VA ACCOUNTANT
job_overview:
We are seeking a Virtual Assistant with specialized experience in tax accounting. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in tax preparation, compliance, and financial reporting, as well as experience supporting finance teams remotely.

Key Responsibilities:
Prepare and review tax returns for individuals and businesses.
Ensure compliance with U.S. tax regulations and filing requirements.
Assist in tax planning and strategy development to optimize financial efficiency.
Conduct tax research and stay updated on regulatory changes.
Support financial reporting and documentation for audits.
Collaborate with the finance team to manage tax-related inquiries.
Maintain accurate and organized financial records.

Qualifications:
QuickBooks proficiency required; CPA certification preferred.
Proven experience in U.S. tax accounting (corporate and individual tax).
Proficiency in tax software and accounting tools (e.g., QuickBooks, SAGE).
Strong knowledge of IRS regulations and tax compliance.
Excellent attention to detail and problem-solving skills.
Strong written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to work independently in a remote setting and meet deadlines.
At least 3-5 years of relevant experience required.

Work Details:
Job Type: Full-time, Remote
Salary: Competitive, based on experience
